svg.style: overflow: hidden; max-width: 100%; touch-action: none; user-select: none; -webkit-user-drag: none; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);

span.p:
🧾 Tools
Type A - 어도비, 캡컷 외
Type B - 다빈치리졸브
Type C - AE, 블렌더3D
